hero.eyebrow: Reliable IT for Dental Practices Across Virginia
hero.headline: Future‑ready systems. Human‑ready support.
hero.subheadline: We provide fully managed IT, security, cloud, and support services designed specifically for dental offices—so your practice stays secure, compliant, and running without disruption.

items.title: Fully Managed IT
items.text: Proactive support for workstations, servers, and networks.

items.title: Security & Compliance‑Aware
items.text: HIPAA-aware practices with modern cybersecurity controls.

items.title: Dental-Focused Expertise
items.text: EMR, imaging, front desk, and operatory workflow support.

items.title: Local & Responsive
items.text: Serving Richmond, NOVA, and statewide Virginia.

whyUs.title: Why Dental Practices Choose Us
bullets: Minimized downtime and faster issue resolution
Secure systems designed for healthcare environments
Support that understands clinical and administrative workflows
philosophy: We combine next-gen design with dependable execution, treating your systems as mission-critical because they are.
Our promise is simple: partnership, transparency, and outstanding work—before, during, and after every project.

groups.title: Fully Managed IT Services
items: Workstation and server management (local or cloud)

groups.title: Dental EMR & Clinical Systems Support
items: Imaging system coordination (X‑ray, scanners, vendor integrations)
Secure access for providers and staff
Coordination with EMR vendors and dental software partners

groups.title: Networking, Wi‑Fi, Infrastructure, VoIP & Cameras
items: Secure wired and wireless network design
VLAN segmentation for clinical and guest networks
Business phone systems (call routing and shared main lines)
Security cameras (on-site or compliant cloud-based systems)

pricing.title: Pricing & Service Plans
pricing.subtitle: Pricing and service plans are tailored to your dental practice’s needs, including office size, devices, and clinical systems. We build each plan to deliver dependable support, security, and performance at fair, competitive pricing across Virginia.

plans.name: Basic Care Plan
plans.monthly: Monthly pricing: custom quote by office size
plans.note: Custom quote based on office size, systems, and support needs.

plans.name: Premium Care + Extended Warranty
plans.monthly: Monthly pricing: custom quote by office size
plans.note: Most practices receive a tailored quote after a short consultation.

rows.basic: Small to mid-size offices needing reliable maintenance and support
rows.premium: Practices that want broader protection, faster support, and predictable IT costs

whoWeServe.title: Who We Serve — Dental Practices
whoWeServe.lead: We specialize in supporting dental practices of all sizes—from single-location offices to growing multi-site groups.
challenges: Operatories depend on reliable workstations and imaging
EMR systems must stay available and secure
Compliance and patient data protection are non-negotiable
approach: Clear communication with staff and vendors
whoWeServe.serviceArea: Service Area: Richmond, NOVA, and statewide Virginia

about.title: About
about.whoWeAre: NexGen Binary is a Virginia-based IT services company focused on delivering secure, reliable, and people-first technology solutions for dental and healthcare environments.
about.leadership: Our CEO Shayan Mirhashemi has over 20 years of experience in information technology across major healthcare organizations. Our team also brings experience supporting healthcare and dental offices, government agencies, and private-sector organizations, giving us enterprise-level discipline with local responsiveness.

contact.title: Contact
contact.lead: If you’re looking for reliable IT support that understands dental practices, we’d be happy to connect.
